about_the_game:
Together Tree: Romance 911 is a relationship application for married couples looking to stimulate love, affection, romance and intimacy in their relationship. Complete daily challenges, complete session evaluations and have a great time rating each other's progress as they rate and review your own. Simple, insightful, rewarding and fun, both partners have an equal say. *For married couples, engaged or in a healthy long term relationship. No "explicit" content.

Developed by a married couple of over 20 years of marriage, Together Tree: Romance 911 is an application (of over 4 years development) that was created from experience, perseverance, team work and love.   

*Your application progress is stored to your device (PC/Tablet) and is private. You can have your progress points recorded to your profile if you are logged in or if you are using a download. Your points are the only application data that can be stored to our cloud. Journals and profile progress can be made private from your privacy settings if you choose to use our community features. 

What You Receive With Your Purchase:

✔️ Together Tree: Romance 911 [PC Application Download]

Purpose and Goals:

✔️ To stimulate your romance and intimacy.

✔️ To rekindle your bond, strengthen and build your friendship.

✔️ To learn more about yourself, your spouse and your relationship.

✔️ To develop a fun and more pleasant relationship and to increase interaction.

🏆 Daily Challenge:

During the Daily Challenge you are both given 3 goals to achieve each day. After the end of the day, each partner gives a quick assessment on how well the other partner achieved those goals. You both then review the results and end the day. Merit points are given to your partner based upon how well they achieved those goals. Growth Badges are also earned as you gain Merit Points. All progress can be saved and continued the next day.

🏆 Session Assessment:

At the end of 3 days of each daily challenge, you and your spouse will be given a Session Assessment. Each evaluation session is a few minutes. You and your partner each respond to a series of phrases through several response options. You then review each other’s responses and then conclude the session with discussions or silent reflection. Affirmation, bonus rewards and commitment goals are added to encourage your progress.

🏆 Merits and Rewards:

Growth Badges are earned for each spouse through progress. Your partner’s assessment of your progress determines the points earned and the badges you receive. You also in turn determine your partner’s progress equally. Your perspective of your partner and your partner’s perspective of you is what matters most here, not the accuracy of the assessment. This is what is reflected over time and inspires motivation on both sides. Accountability can be automatic and helps to keep your progress honest and fair without any 3rd party intervention.

*Progress and results are based upon each couple's willingness to work together. We make no claims or guarantees for any personal success or prevention of failure.

Benefits and Rewards:

✔️ One time payment. No monthly Fees.

✔️ Co-op based (2 People are Required). Can be used in conjunction with therapy but no 3rd party is every needed.

✔️ Earn Merit points and Growth Badges. Rewards progress and development.

✔️ Fun and easy to use. Instructions and menus are simple to navigate.

✔️ Time considerate. Sessions do not take up a lot of time but can be quite impactful.

Expectations:

✔️ Progress is entirely up to each couple. Co-op based.

✔️ You must stay committed and motivated to complete the process.

✔️ The both of you will encourage and mentor your own development.

✔️ Commitment is the process. Team work is the progress.

✔️ You both are the key to your success.
